name: Wacebo USA, Inc.
description:
Established in 2013, we are leaders in the Italian EdTech market, with headquarters in Rome, Milan, and Bari, as well as hubs in New York (USA) and London (UK). We specialize in crafting interactive solutions tailored for both educational and commercial landscapes, and in creating innovative learning environments. 

Our slogan, "Think Digital", embodies our unwavering commitment to revolutionizing learning and professional engagement, ushering in a new era of modernity, dynamism, and interactivity. We are dedicated to the relentless pursuit of technologically advanced ecosystems, fostering digital exploration, seamless communication, and immersive learning experiences. 

We are a young, dynamic, and versatile group, driven by passion and determination. Our commitment to teamwork, sharing, and constant dialogue enables us to adapt quickly to changes while remaining innovative and competitive in the market. Central to our corporate mission is the establishment of an extensive network of Distributors, Partners, and Retailers. Our B2B business model allows us to collaborate closely with our partners rather than compete with them. 

We were the first Italian manufacturer to secure the esteemed Google EDLA (Enterprise Device License Agreement) license for our groundbreaking interactive displays. This achievement underscores our pledge to deliver products characterized by unparalleled security, longevity, upgradability, and user-friendliness.

company_updates_collection.description:
✨ A pinnacle of cutting-edge Made in Italy technology, the Dabliu Touch E13 is designed to transform the way we teach, learn, and work. Already the #1 interactive monitor in Italy, it comes in four sizes (65, 75, 86 and 100 inches) and a breathtaking 4K Ultra HD resolution. 

Supporting multiple simultaneous touches and equipped with powerful features, it fosters seamless collaboration and efficiency. Preloaded with many interactive tools and countless apps, the Dabliu Touch E13 transforms lessons, meetings, and teamwork into dynamic, engaging, and immersive experiences. 🚀

✅ Thanks to the EDLA certification, it also offers seamless integration with the entire Google ecosystem and fits effortlessly into any environment, whether mounted on the wall or on its dedicated accessories. 

Dabliu Touch E13 (Education Series): smart learning and working begins with a #Touch. 

👉🏻 Discover more: https://lnkd.in/dMmS9MEa 

👉🏻 Download the data sheet: https://lnkd.in/dTdzNZgd

And now that the opening of Wacebo USA Inc. is official…

We are excited to introduce our new Director of Sales & Vice President of Wacebo USA Inc., John Geerlings! 💙

John is a highly respected professional with extensive experience in both the audio-visual technology and education markets. He will be responsible for establishing a network of distributors, partners, and retailers across the USA, while overseeing all Wacebo operations in the American market.

Please, join us in extending a warm welcome and our best wishes for success and growth to John - welcome aboard! 🎉 

Wacebo Europe Srl
#wacebousa

We are thrilled to announce the opening of Wacebo USA Inc.! 🥳 

It's with great pride that we share this incredible milestone with you all: Wacebo has landed in the United States! After years of envisioning this moment, our American dream is now a reality. 🤩

This new chapter propels us into a future of greater innovation, allowing us to develop even more cutting-edge solutions for both education and training. Our mission? To continue transforming education on a global scale. 🚀

Come visit us in the heart of New York City, at our flagship showroom located at 246 E 58th St. We’re ready for this bold "stars and stripes" adventure...are you ready to join us? 💓

Wacebo Europe Srl
#wacebousa #americandream #dreamsdocometrue

❇️ Foster collaboration and communication between students, teachers, and parents

A conclusione della Texas Computer Education Association Convention and Exposition ad #Austin, #Texas, possiamo dire di essere estremamente grati e soddisfatti. 🙏🏻 

L'interesse e lo stupore suscitati dalle nostre #soluzioni ci hanno davvero riempito il cuore di gioia 💖 e ci hanno profondamente ispirato. ✨

Questa esperienza è stata davvero #indimenticabile e non vediamo l'ora di tornare in Texas! 🇺🇸 💕

Un #ringraziamento #speciale a chi ha reso tutto questo possibile:

❇️ Il nostro #team Wacebo: insieme, possiamo conquistare qualsiasi traguardo. 🚀

❇️ Muzo-works.com per aver arricchito il nostro stand con i loro arredi e JuiceBot. 😎

Wacebo USA, Inc.

We’re beyond #grateful for the #appreciation and #interest shown by both #educators and #vendors in our solutions. Your #support means the world to us! 🙏🏻 

We hope you had as much #fun as we did. We can’t wait to do it all again! 😍

🚀 Welcome to our new #series, “Let’s dispel a myth,” where we explore the big #questions surrounding educational #technology and #innovation.

In the first #episode, we tackle one of the most debated questions in the #field: “Will teachers be replaced by technology?” 🤔

Discover why the answer is a firm “#no,” supported by #research and #data from prestigious institutions like #Harvard and #Stanford. 🔎

👇🏻 What do you think is the role of teachers in the future of education? Share your thoughts in the comments!

In the age of Artificial Intelligence, integrating technology into education is essential for enhancing learning and preparing students for the future. 🚀

EdTech has the power to:

❇️ Boost student engagement with interactive and personalized learning experiences
❇️ Streamline classroom management, making it easier to monitor progress and provide tailored instruction
❇️ Support personalized learning by adapting content to each student’s unique needs
❇️ Equip students with digital skills critical for success in both academics and their future careers
❇️ Expand access to educational resources, breaking down the barriers of traditional classroom learning
❇️ Foster collaboration and communication between students, teachers, and parents

So, how do you choose the right EdTech? 🤔

Let’s dive into the key criteria for selecting the solutions that will truly transform the learning experience! 😊

👉🏻 Contact us to discover the solutions that best meet your needs: https://lnkd.in/dEhAzAaY

🌍 As #society becomes more aware of its #impact on #climate #change, one of the biggest educational #challenges is making sure that all students develop the skills needed for #sustainability. It’s not just about preparing for future challenges – it’s about #empowering the next generation to lead a more #responsible and #innovative world. 🌱

💡 Teaching #sustainability is no longer just an educational choice – it’s a crucial #investment in creating a #sustainable and #prosperous future for everyone.

Scroll through the #carousel to discover:

✔ How the #USA is preparing younger generations for the green transition
✔ Why #integrating sustainability into education is so important
✔ How we’re making a #difference

👉🏻 Get in touch to find the right solutions for you or to schedule a demo: https://lnkd.in/dEhAzAaY

🚀 Exciting #news! 🚀

We’re joining forces with Phi Services and Nialli Inc. to showcase how advanced #technology and #intuitive visual #tools can help teams work smarter and achieve better results. 🤩 

🔹 Experience real-time collaboration in action
🔹 Discover powerful tools that simplify project planning
🔹 Get hands-on with interactive demonstrations that'll transform the way you work

If you’re attending New York Build Expo, make sure to stop by booth #1347 — we’d love to connect! 💜

Wacebo Europe Srl

We created the Dabliu Pen + to help students rediscover the power of handwriting - with a smart, digital twist. And no, it’s not just nostalgia: the benefits of handwriting are proven by neuroscience. 

With Dabliu Pen +, students can unlock:

🧠 Sharper focus, memory, and retention
💡 Deeper learning and critical thinking
✍🏽 Stronger language skills and creativity
🪷 A calmer, more relaxed mind

And for educators?

Dabliu Pen + is a game-changer for them too, especially in today’s multilingual, multicultural classrooms. Thanks to its AI features, it helps teachers decode handwriting and, when needed, translate it on the spot, enabling:

✨ Smoother communication
🌍 More inclusive learning
💭 Less guesswork in understanding student needs

➡️ Scroll to discover more 
📍 Come experience it first-hand at ISTE Live 2025 (San Antonio, #TX), booth #1554! 

Let’s bridge the learning gap, together. 💙

#DabliuPenPlus #EdTech #SmartPenTechnology #DigitalTransformation

We’re excited to present, together with Google, our new Dabliu #Chromebox OPS: the first OPS module powered by ChromeOS & Chrome Enterprise, designed to seamlessly integrate with our #DabliuTouch interactive displays. 🚀

Compact, powerful, and secure, the Dabliu Chromebox OPS further enhances the everyday experience in classrooms and offices, offering a familiar, modern, and always-connected environment.

✅ Simple and efficient device management thanks to cloud architecture
📂 Instant access to Google Workspace, Workspace for Education, Classroom, Meet, and much more
🖥️ Intuitive interface with Google account sign-in for a familiar experience
🛍️ Thousands of educational and professional apps available on the Google Play Store
🛡️ Advanced security with automatic updates, built-in antivirus, sandboxing, and verified boot
🧩 Centralized, flexible, and scalable IT management
✨ Available with Education, Enterprise, and Kiosk & Signage Upgrade licenses
🔗 Integration with Class Tools coming soon, for an even richer and more interactive teaching experience

Another step forward toward a smarter, more connected digital future. 🫶🏻

#DabliuChromeboxOPS #EdTech #GoogleForEducation #innovation #education #technology
